thread.title: The Mountain Goats Announce New Album Goths , Share New Song: Listen
thread.title_full: The Mountain Goats Announce New Album Goths , Share New Song: Listen

author: Sam Sodomsky
title: The Mountain Goats Announce New Album Goths , Share New Song: Listen
text: The Mountain Goats Announce New Album Goths , Share New Song: Listen Track titles include “Stench of the Unburied,” “Paid in Cocaine,” “Wear Black” The Mountain Goats Jeff Kravitz/FilmMagic for Michael Dorf Presents The Mountain Goats have announced a new album, titled Goths . The follow-up to 2015’s wrestling-centric Beat the Champ is out May 19 via Merge . Listen to “Andrew Eldritch Is Moving Back to Leeds” and check out the cover art and tracklist below. The Mountain Goats’ lineup on Goths is a quartet, featuring Matt Douglas on woodwinds. The album's Bandcamp page notes: “NO COMPED VOCALS, NO PITCH CORRECTION, NO GUITARS.” A deluxe edition of the album features four bonus tracks. The Mountain Goats will tour in support of the album throughout 2017: see their dates here . Earlier this month, Darnielle released his new novel Universal Harvester , followed by a book tour . Since Beat the Champ , Darnielle has shared several new Mountain Goats tracks, including “ Going Back to California ” and “ The Ultimate Jedi Who Wastes All the Other Jedi and Eats Their Bones ,” a joke song he wrote for The Last Jedi director Rian Johnson. Goths by The Mountain Goats Goths: 02 Andrew Eldritch Is Moving Back to Leeds03 The Grey King and the Silver Flame Attunement04 We Do It Different on the West Coast05 Unicorn Tolerance06 Stench of the Unburied07 Wear Black
